hero.title: Hi, I'm Mukhammaddiyor — Frontend Developer.
hero.subtitle: From May to November, I worked at Global Move Company. Since late November, I have been working on the GameFit project up to the present.

sections.aboutText: I have completed 8 months of study at Najot Ta'lim Educational Center. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong focus on responsive design and user experience. I have experience working with React and state management tools such as Context API, Redux, and Redux Toolkit. I am also skilled in version control using Git and GitHub. I possess strong problem-solving and analytical thinking skills, with an effective approach to debugging and code optimization. I am committed to continuous learning and staying up to date with modern front-end frameworks, best practices, and industry trends. In addition, I have experience working with Astro and Strapi technologies.
